messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on the communications traffic on your station, we believe that one of the station's lesser lifeforms has developed moderate level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Attention all Survivors, You have been detected to have a Level 10 Biohazard aboard your station, Quarentine protocol is now in effect. An Emergency Response Team is inbound. Centcom Out

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Unstable bluespace anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Transfer Centre.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to climate change, a number of rodents have stampeded into the maintenance tunnels.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Law Office.
